description: A massive island-ship commanded by Gecko Moria, one of the Seven Warlords of the Sea. The ship is so large it resembles an island and serves as the base for Moria's zombie army.

keyEvents.title: Straw Hats Execute Four-Person Combination Attack
keyEvents.description: The Straw Hats coordinate the Raikotsuken: Gavotte Bond en Avant combination attack on Thriller Bark's main deck, piercing Oars' shoulder.
keyEvents.significance: Shows the crew working together in one of their most complex coordinated attacks yet.

keyEvents.title: Moria Reveals Shadow Revolution
keyEvents.description: On Thriller Bark, Moria demonstrates the full extent of his shadow manipulation powers by using Shadow Revolution to give Oars stretching abilities.
keyEvents.significance: Major power reveal showing Moria's Devil Fruit versatility beyond simple shadow theft.

keyEvents.title: Robin's Shadow Stolen
keyEvents.description: Moria steals Robin's shadow on Thriller Bark, causing her to lose consciousness and be unable to survive in sunlight.
keyEvents.significance: Critical moment as another Straw Hat loses their shadow to Moria's powers.

keyEvents.title: Straw Hat Crew Decimated
keyEvents.description: By the end of the battle on Thriller Bark's main area, five Straw Hats (Brook, Robin, Sanji, Chopper, Franky) are defeated with only Nami, Zoro, and Usopp remaining standing.
keyEvents.significance: One of the darkest moments for the crew, showing them overwhelmed and defeated.

statusHistory.reason: Thriller Bark is operational as Moria's base
